ygData.subject: Re: mip = many innapropriate pictures?
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a known bug in the latest V3 drivers, I believe. Keep mipmapping disabled until they fix it. ... to ... to ... settings, ... restarted. ... and ...
ygData.messageBody:
This is a known bug in the latest V3 drivers, I believe.

Keep mipmapping disabled until they fix it.

> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> Hi,
> sorry this is off topic and I would happily accept as an answer a pointer
to
> where it is on topic...but my 2D card died and I leapt at the opportunity
to
> migrate to a voodoo3 2000. Well, I was guessing at all the correct
settings,
> but mip mapping seemed like a good idea, until I selected it and
restarted.
> At that point none of the textures were ones the designers intended and as
> entertaining as it was to see an female Ogres face scroll across the sky I
> am not sure I care for it as a steady diet. I settled on turning it off
and
> using "Force mip mapping" on the 3dfx control panel, which returned the
> world to "normal".
> In short, is there a set of canonical settings for EQ and a Voodoo3 2000?
>
> TIA,
> Tszaaz, still on a PII 233 and 56K as well.
>
>
